recipes.name: chocolate nero cookies
recipes.ingredients: 1 almond,2 eggs,1/3 granulated sugar,2 bittersweet chocolate,2 unsalted butter,1/2 flour,1 baking powder,To roll castor sugar,To roll icing sugar

recipes.name: irish coffee
recipes.ingredients:
50 Ml Unsweetened Cold Whipping Cream,
2 Tbsp Soft Brown Sugar,
50 Ml Irish Whisky,
1 Cup Freshly Brewed Coffee,
To sprinkle Nutmeg (optional)

recipes.name: tricolor macaroons
recipes.ingredients:
1 Cup almond flour,
1.5 cup powdered sugar,
3 egg whites,
1/4 tsp cream of tartar,
3 tbsp white sugar,
green food colour,
orange food colour,
white food colour,
2 tbsp unsalted butter,
100 gms cream cheese,
1 cup powdered sugar,
1 tsp vanilla extract,
2 tsp heavy cream

recipes.name: vegetable bruschetta
recipes.ingredients:
30 gms baguette (grilled slices),
20 gms black olive tapenade,
35 gms artichoke hearts, grilled,
5 gms lettuce arugula (trimmed),
50 gms tomato confit,
3 gms fresh basil leaves,
3 gms mint leaves,
20 gms zucchini,
30 gms goat cheese,
8 gms parmesan cheese shavings,
20 gms mozzarella buffalo cheese
